channel.title: RSCUnderworld, soon coming to a world near you!
channel.description:
Hello, RSCUnderworld is a server that has been in development for a while now, and the team and I believe we are finally at the stage of almost having a source ready to release a real RuneScape Classic private server, RSCUnderworld.
The base of the server is RSCUnderworld's source, we are not using RSCD/RSCA etc. We have created this source from scratch and have been developing it for months.
The source is very advanced and uses an API called Netty. The server uses a script engine, which is made in pure java and can be recalled by the server at anytime, which means we can make updates and changes to the server without a system restart.
The server has many advanced features than any other runescape classic private server such as sending PM’s from forum to game and PM’s from game to forum by clicking on a offline player, this system allows you to send PM’s to offline players in-game.
We have changed the way landscapes are loaded, into a height system. By doing this there can be more than 1 game running in one area at the same time without interacting with the other games that are running.
Clan systems will have options to share exp, if you want to share exp with clan mates in the same section as you, you can. This can be done through the site, which can be updated at any time.
RSCUnderworld will have no commands in game at all and everything can be done via the site to give it the real runescape classic game-play.
We have rewrote the core to fluxbb to integrate our own SEO plug in, this plug in shows better search engine ranks on Google, Yahoo and Bing. By doing this all threads and accounts will appear on any search engine by a simple search even if someone is not searching for rscunderworld and searches for Runescape Classic, RSCUnderworld will be found. Read more about SEO here (Search engine optimization) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Search_engine_optimization
The server's XP rate will be 4x & it will be P2P based. There will NOT be any custom weapons and Armour, it will be purely RSC based.
Staminus will host us on a dedicated server with DDoS protection.
Estimated time of release: 1 week
For further news & updates on the server visit our forums In the Signature Below !!!
Feel free to ask questions, haters will be ignored.

item.title: RSCUnderworld, soon coming to a world near you!
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Outspoken, post:12, topic:410218”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=511458.msg3713508#msg3713508 date=1313486188]

[quote author=Outspoken link=topic=511458.msg3713503#msg3713503 date=1313485888]

Why the fuck do people support you when you have blatant disrespect for those who develop your shit? TX is a pure douchebag, but he is still your superior.

Why would I respect T_X exactly? Have you seen this thread?

I have utmost respect for people who have actually contributed to RSCE (such as Zilent + Pyru). And no, T_X is not ‘my superior’ in any way, shape or form.
[/quote]To your point about not being superior in any way - do you consider yourself better at coding than he? Have you and/or do you use his code directly or indirectly? You paid him for his “skill”, “skill” which you don’t have. Considering your trade has everything to do with code, I’d say you should respect ANYONE who has contributed ANYTHING significant to you or the scene in general - doesn’t mean you have to like him. But know your place.

Noun: A feeling of deep admiration for someone or something elicited by their abilities, qualities, or achievements.

Luke doesn’t have to like turkish idiot, just feel a deep admiration for his ability to make an amazing landscape editor.
[/quote]You’d have to be quite stupid to assume that’s the only definition for respect. You picked the definition you wanted rather than the one applicable to the current context.

I’m baffled at how you think TX is Kryptix’s superior. Lol.

How do you figure he’s not?

Where did I say he isn’t?[/quote]
It was implied…

You’re also deflecting the question…

Read full topic
item.source: RSCUnderworld, soon coming to a world near you!

Luke doesn’t have to like turkish idiot, just feel a deep admiration for his ability to make an amazing landscape editor.
